name: Honk

Now migrated from SLP to smartBCH, its scope has expanded to HONK World, which includes farming and NFTs. HONK World and its HONK token aim to bring more fun into crypto and the smartBCH ecosystem!

name: LAWTOKEN

name: Green Ben

name: CashCats
desc: CashCats aims to be an extension of the BCH peer-to-peer electronic cash movement & a mascot for the BCH community. We love $CATS! Our goal is to show as much love & respect as possible to everyone around the world and spread $CATS and introduce smartBCH to as many people as possible!

name: Bitcoin Cash Argentina

name: UatX Token
desc: UatX Project is a non-profit organization used to maintain BCH nodes and smartbch rpc server nodes. At present, we are running China optimized sbch nodes and servers, and we will add more servers for global use in the near future. All income will be funded for project development, such as adding new networks and servers. Currently running rpc.uatvo.com and multi coin node.

name: MAZE
desc: MAZE is mineable (proof-of-work) smartBCH virtual asset. It is decentralized (operates without a central issuer and without a centralized promotion or sales developement). No premine and no presale. Max total supply: 21m. Due to decentralization and permissionless character, there is no specific market target. However digital visual arts are most welcome.

name: CashKitten
desc: $kitten is a SEP20 token in smartBCH. It devotes itself to become the cutest meme token loved by BCHer. Most of the tokens have been deployed for free to their fans. Kitten represents BCHer's curiosity and exploration towards world. $kitten will grow up with their owners.

name: flexUSD

name: CandyMan

name: MGOT
desc: Mode of Transfer Alternative (MoTA) is an Assistive Technology for Blockchain transactions and transfers between non-technicals. MoTA brings blockchain transactions to remote and technologically handicapped individuals and communities through a decentralized censorship-resistant network of enablers. The MoTA Hub is the platform being developed to facilitate blockchain use by societies where not everyone has a phone or access to the internet and where most of the people are not technologically literate. MoTA Global Operational Token (MGOT) drives this project with many incentives for holders helping grow blockchain adoption.

name: MrUSD
desc: The MoTA Remit Universal Stable Digital (MrUSD) token is a project utility token. This is a token that allows MTs and IUs on the MH to transfer BA across the MH. In other words, it is a transfer vehicle on the MH. MTs can hold MrUSD. IUs can also hold MrUSD as well. MrUSD is transformed at any MTs for FM. IUs may also interact directly between themselves with MrUSD.

A burn wallet receives a portion of the reflections to never be seen again. Total supply: 1 quadrillion. Maximum amount in each transaction: 5 trillion. Initial liquidity is locked for 3 years. name: AxieBCH
desc: AxieBCH is the first & only Play-2-Earn gaming guild based exclusively on Bitcoin Cash as guild members payout cryptocurrency, and smartBCH token $AXIEBCH as an investment & reward vehicle. Gaming guilds play an important role in the Play-2-Earn gaming industry. They allow new players to start exploring the games without paying high upfront costs. As guilds are interested to maximize their playersâ€™ earning potential, they also offer some valuable additional services to their members: coaching, teams upgrade, e-sport events.

name: Game
desc: GAME is the world-first CRUT-token, launched on smartBCH. CRUT means: Community, Reflection, Utility, Transparency. It distributes 3% of all transactions among current holders, has several strong use cases and active community behind it.

name: BenSwap Bridged BUSD Token
desc: Binance USD (BUSD) is a 1:1 USD-backed stable coin issued by Binance (in partnership with Paxos), Approved and regulated by the New York State Department of Financial Services (NYDFS). This is a token bridged by BenSwap from BNB Smart Chain (BSC).

name: Golden Ben
desc: Golden Ben (GBEN) is the utility and governance token of BenSwap on BNB Smart Chain (BSC).

name: BenSwap Bridged BNB Token
desc: Binance Coin (BNB) is the cryptocurrency issued by Binance exchange.

name: BenSwap Bridged Bitcoin
desc: Bitcoin is a decentralized cryptocurrency originally described in a 2008 whitepaper by a person, or group of people, using the alias Satoshi Nakamoto. It was launched soon after, in January 2009. This is a token bridged by BenSwap from BNB Smart Chain (BSC).

name: BenSwap Bridged Ether
desc: Ethereum is a decentralized open-source blockchain system that features its own cryptocurrency, Ether. ETH works as a platform for numerous other cryptocurrencies, as well as for the execution of decentralized smart contracts. This is a token bridged by BenSwap from BNB Smart Chain (BSC).

name: BenSwap Bridged USDP Token
desc: Pax Dollar is a flat-collateralized stablecoin operated by Paxos. This is a token bridged by BenSwap from BNB Smart Chain (BSC).

name: BenSwap Bridged USDT Token
desc: USDT is a stablecoin that mirrors the price of the U.S. dollar, issued by a Hong Kong-based company Tether. This is a token bridged by BenSwap from BNB Smart Chain (BSC).

name: BenSwap Bridged USDC Token
desc: USD Coin is a stablecoin that is pegged to the U.S. dollar on a 1:1 basis. The Centre consortium, which is behind this asset, says USDC is issued by regulated financial institutions. This is a token bridged by BenSwap from BNB Smart Chain (BSC).

name: SmartIndex
desc: First deflationary and governance token linked to a managed portfolio on smartBCH.

name: Chinese Zodiac 2023 - Rabbit
desc: RBT2023 is a meme token to celebrate and commemorate the Lunar Festival of the year 2023. It has a fixed supply of 55k tokens. 25k tokens are sold in an IBO for EBEN at 1:1 rate and then add liquidity with another 25k. The rest 5k is produced in a ranch which lasts for about 15 weeks. It has a price protection mechanism. Once its price drops below the IBO price (1 EBEN), it will be bought back, so that its price has a guaranteed bottom.

name: FOGToken
desc: FOG is a major utility token in Fog of War. Fog of War is a gamified farming and NFT staking platform that uses whitelisted single-token staking and decentralized exchange (DEX) liquidity pair tokens (LP) for its own farms.

name: FOGXP
desc: FXP can be earned in the Arena and used to level up your heros. Fog of War is a gamified farming and NFT staking platform that uses whitelisted single-token staking and decentralized exchange (DEX) liquidity pair tokens (LP) for its own farms.

desc: Goblins Cash is a decentralized reserve currency protocol on smartBCH.
